name: Dominique Ouattara
description:
We gotta say — without any prejudice — that this woman looks like she sells real estate. We mean it in the best possible way; just look at that well-coiffed head of hair, the immaculate makeup, the trustworthy look in her eyes! Don't you just want to buy property from her?

Well, you won't see Dominique Outtara's picture on an advertising bench. She used to run an international real estate company, but has moved on from that job.

We gotta say — without any prejudice — that this woman looks like she sells beauty products. We mean it in the best possible way; just look at that well-coiffed head of hair, the immaculate makeup, the trustworthy look in her eyes!

Well, you won't find Dominique Outtara spritzing people in the mall. She used to run an international beauty company, but has moved on from that job.

Today, Dominque Outtara, daughter of a French Jew, is... the first lady of the Ivory Coast.

Let her know if you need some Ivorian real estate? Not sure about beauty products...
